net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_SavedAttacks_updateState
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Update the state according to the damage calculation

arg(0) = the state object
  {
    "hit": Has a hit occurred?, 1=hit, 0=miss, -1 = no attack
    "check": Has a check occurred?, 1=check passed, 0=check failed, -1 = no check
    "save": The last Save rollExpression rolled or ""
    "action": Flag indicating that this is for an Action as opposed to an attack
    "totalDamage": The total amount of damage take from the roll
    "output": The output text
  }
arg(1) = The object returned by dnd5e_SavedAttacks_CalculateDamage
arg(2) = The damage expression with the die roll tooltips in it.

Returns the updated state
